attributes.title: Disappointing
attributes.review: The quality of the app is poor & it’s hard to navigate, I am disappointed because I was looking forward to it easily keeping me up to date with the Trump campaign. 1 star

attributes.title: not a fan!!!!!!
attributes.review: wanted to support our second favorite ✨annoying orange✨ so i downloaded this app but was severely disappointed! bad UI bad UX design, hard to navigate, app kept crashing, supports a racist and sexist pig, 0/10 would recommend!

attributes.title: Phone crashed!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app for updates on my wonderful president but the whole app crashed and my phone started to slow down significantly. Oh well guess I’ll have to miss out on this great app 👁👄👁

attributes.title: Wish I could give it a zero.
attributes.review: Horrible horrible app. This app promotes the support of a sexual predator, a white supremacist, and a fame loving narcissist who doesn’t care about the well being of the American people. That should be a violation of Apple’s policies if you ask me.

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: The app keeps crashing on me and sense downloading it I have to restart my device every couple of minutes as my phone now freezes. I am deleting it immediately. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. Im pretty sure this isnt Trumps real app its just a scam.

attributes.title: Horrible for one simple reason
attributes.review: This app tells you that u can engage and get the latest news on Mr. Trumps election and campaign but what it fails to mention is the information you get is not always factual. Lots of propaganda. Should not be allowed periodt 💅🏼🤦‍♀️🧚🏽‍♂️

attributes.title: 💫👁👄👁🧚🏼‍♀️✨
attributes.review:
HORRIBLE!!! It took HOURS to download and kept crashing whenever I opened it!! I was so distraught about my experience that when my parents saw me sobbing it drove them into a depressive state and now we’re gonna have to vote democratic🙄🙄🙄
Also stan Harry styles :)

attributes.title: POPPY HEAD APP 🤮🤮🤢
attributes.review: WORST APP EVER CREATED ON EARTH! it took 1 week to download 💩💩💩 after it finally downloaded I HAD TO SEE AN UGLY ORANGE CHETTO MAN 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮 and the app hacked ALLLLL if my stuff. TAKE IT DOWN!!!!! it’s useless as hell trump is useless as hell but TikTok isn’t so f him for trying to take it down BUT THE APP THEN froze for 3 years 🥱🥱 NEVER EVER EVEN BOTHER DOWNLOADING it will hack all your stuff 🥰🥰🥰💕😌✌🏼😍😈👀

attributes.title: Horrible.
attributes.review: This app is laggy and full of hateful racist content. I no longer support this man. He has lost my vote. Also i’ve come to find out he’s a rapist and child predator. Thank you to my daughter for informing me of this disturbing information.

attributes.title: Yeah❤️
attributes.review: This app makes me so sad. My mental health had said 📉 downloading this app. I real disrespected and disgusted. The man that runs this app has been so disrespectful bc he has orange face and as an orange person I am very offended. I can’t even believed they let that slide. Smh. I hate it here. I truly do.
